publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5104 Stuart McMillan: Hidden Killer Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates the Health and Safety Executive for its awareness campaign targeting tradesmen across Scotland to beware of the hidden killer of asbestos; notes that the campaign aims to raise awareness of the risks posed by asbestos and how workers can best protect themselves; further notes that official figures show that about 20 tradesmen a week in the United Kingdom die from asbestos-related diseases and that this number is rising, and urges tradesmen everywhere to pay attention to the campaign in order to protect themselves and colleagues from the threat of asbestos-related conditions. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Bill Wilson*, Bob Doris*, Mike Pringle*, Angela Constance*, Aileen Campbell*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Ian McKee*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-5104 Hidden Killer Campaign (lodged on 2 November 2009) John Park*, Elaine Smith*, Sandra White*
S3M-5104 Hidden Killer Campaign (lodged on 2 November 2009) Jackie Baillie*, Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*
S3M-5104 Hidden Killer Campaign (lodged on 2 November 2009) Gil Paterson*

S3M-5104 Stuart McMillan: Hidden Killer Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates the Health and Safety Executive for its awareness campaign targeting tradesmen across Scotland to beware of the hidden killer of asbestos; notes that the campaign aims to raise awareness of the risks posed by asbestos and how workers can best protect themselves; further notes that official figures show that about 20 tradesmen a week in the United Kingdom die from asbestos-related diseases and that this number is rising, and urges tradesmen everywhere to pay attention to the campaign in order to protect themselves and colleagues from the threat of asbestos-related conditions. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Bill Kidd, Bill Wilson, Bob Doris, Mike Pringle, Angela Constance, Aileen Campbell, Joe FitzPatrick, Ian McKee, Shirley-Anne Somerville, John Park, Elaine Smith, Sandra White, Jackie Baillie, Rob Gibson, Robin Harper, Gil Paterson, Ken Macintosh*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-5104 Hidden Killer Campaign (lodged on 2 November 2009) Anne McLaughlin*
S3M-5104 Hidden Killer Campaign (lodged on 2 November 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
